meta.article_title: October 7, 2019 - Top Ten Reasons You Might Not Be as Good at Table Tennis as You Could Be

top-ten-reasons-you-might-not-be-as-good.probleme: You have faced really good serves and yet have made no serious attempt to learn them yourself.

debutant: Make a serious attempt to learn new serves.

exercices_complementaires.description: Practice different types of serves, such as topspin and backspin.

erreurs_a_eviter: Don't get discouraged by mistakes and keep practicing.
